title.zh: 上海：2025年度助残企业家论坛
title.en: Shanghai: 2025 Annual Forum for Entrepreneurs Supporting People with Disabilities

subtitle.zh: 南昌市血之友公益协会参展

description.zh: 2025年度助残企业家论坛在上海举行，左钰洁代表南昌市血之友公益协会参展。论坛汇聚了众多关注残障人士权益的企业家和公益组织，共同探讨如何更好地支持和帮助残障群体，血友姐妹会在论坛上展示了在血友病女性关爱领域的工作成果。
description.en: The 2025 Annual Forum for Entrepreneurs Supporting People with Disabilities was held in Shanghai. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo represented Nanchang Hemophilia Association at the exhibition. The forum brought together many entrepreneurs and public welfare organizations concerned about the rights of people with disabilities to discuss how to better support and help the disabled community. The Hemophilia Sisters team showcased their work achievements in the field of hemophilia women's care at the forum.

description.zh: 血友姐妹会摆摊参展，发放宣传折页
description.en: Hemophilia Sisters team exhibition booth, distributing promotional materials

description.zh: 助残企业家论坛签名墙留念
